Frontend application with pages for browsing, sharing, and searching promotions
Backend API server to manage promotions, users, and website settings
PostgreSQL database connection using environment variables DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
User authentication system for accessing the management backend
Promotion creation, editing, and deletion functionality in the management backend
User management interface in the backend for administrators
Website settings configuration panel in the management backend
Search functionality allowing users to filter promotions by keywords or categories
Promotion sharing capability through social media or direct links
Responsive web design with ivory colored outer layout and forest green UI blocks
RESTful API endpoints for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting promotions
Data validation and error handling for all user inputs and API requests
Concurrent development setup with npm run dev starting both frontend and backend
Installation script via package.json supporting npm run install:all for dependencies
Static asset serving for frontend files when not using dynamic content
